creator: PlaypoolMobile
descriptionHtml: f big trucks & trailers of 18 wheels is here to make a USA truck simulator game more fantastic as big trucking jobs. You will enjoy very realistic controls of all long euro trucks. Every big truck has its own characteristics of the extreme trucker simulator with the variation of truck engine power, Big cargo truck speed and truck fuel consumption and etc. We make a euro truck control very lovely to make this truck driving adventure more delicious like Americans-truck simulator. Driving these heavy trucks in Lorry Truck Simulator is not that easy as the roads are not very smooth. You have to take care of the cargo and make sure you drive that cargo to the destination. Do not fall as the roads are very narrow and you have to be very good in driving to finish the levels. real truck and Silk Road Cargo Simulator dynamic gameplay, this game exactly is precision driving simulator. Silk Road Truck exciting driving experience that will make you feel like driving real long trucks on silk road of trade routs which connected East and West in real life.
descriptionShort: real Truck driving skills! Who doesn't love Truck driving?
